Index.title: MIYAAR
Index.description: Elevate your daily ritual with our ethically sourced, masterfully roasted beans. Taste the difference of true craftsmanship.

features.roastedDesc: Small batches roasted to perfection to highlight unique flavor profiles.
features.sourcedDesc: Direct trade partnerships ensuring fair wages for our farmers.
features.qualityDesc: Only the top 1% of Arabica beans make it into our signature blends.

ethiopian-origin.name: Ethiopian Origin
ethiopian-origin.description: Floral & Citrus notes. Washed process. Altitude 2000m-2200m.

colombian-roast.name: Colombian Roast
colombian-roast.description: Smooth chocolate body with hints of caramel.

miyaar-signature.name: Miyaar Signature Blend
miyaar-signature.description: Our award-winning house blend. Perfectly balanced.

travel-tumbler.name: Miyaar Travel Tumbler
travel-tumbler.description: Matte black vacuum insulated tumbler. Keeps coffee hot for 6 hours.

miyaar-gift-box.name: Miyaar Gift Box
miyaar-gift-box.description: The ultimate luxury gift. Includes beans, mug, and accessories.

ceramic-cup.name: Ceramic Tasting Cup
ceramic-cup.description: Handcrafted ceramic cup designed to enhance aroma.
